ej,andes101,M,koscg901,Checked swing $Tigers manager Anderson ejected by 3B umpire Kosc for arguing check swing on Wills

ej,houkr101,M,garcr901,Call at 1B (reversed) $Red Sox Manager Houk ejected by HP umpire Garcia when call at 1st eas reversed; Mendoza was called out by 1B umpire Kosc but the call was overruled by Garcia since it was his call

ej,cowea001,P,johnm901,Checked swing Al Cowens ejected by HP umpire Mark Johnson

ej,johnc001,P,phild901,Fighting after ground out $Johnson ejected by HP umpire Phillips for fighting; after grounding out, he ran by mound and started a fight pitcher Darwin; both benches cleared and there were several fights with Johnson in many of them; he was still angry from being hit on the hip by a pitch in the 6th
